title: 78/153/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1977 authorizing Ireland to take certain protective measures under Article 108 (3) of the EEC Treaty (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 22 December 1977  authorizing Ireland to take certain protective measures under Article 108 (3) of the EEC Treaty  (Only the English text is authentic)  (78/153/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The Commission shall keep under close review the development of the economic situation in Ireland. It shall investigate the situation and the effects of the measures authorized herein not later than 31 December 1978.
2. The Commission reserves the right to amend or revoke this Decision if it finds that the conditions on which it was based have changed or that the effects of the Decision are more restrictive than is necessary to achieve its purpose.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
